title: Earth and Space Science SP.2.d
prompt:
An engineer wants to test the effectiveness of a specific wall construction in withstanding the shaking of an earthquake. The engineer hypothesizes that the wall construction will withstand earthquakes 10% stronger than what current construction methods can withstand. The engineer’s lab has a simulation chamber that is built to simulate various types of earthquake shaking at varying magnitudes on scale models.

Design a controlled experiment that the engineer can use to test this hypothesis. Include descriptions of the data collected and how the engineer will determine if the hypothesis is correct.
feedback: Thank you for your response. Your response will be graded as soon as possible.
